sql-statement.name: tenant.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT ADDRESS_BOOK_VALUE, AUTO_WRAPUP_INTERVAL, CAD_HIDDEN_FROM_AGENT, COMPANY_NAME, LOGIN_DOMAIN, TENANT_ID, TENANT_XML_URL, MULTI_LOGIN_PRECEDENCE FROM tenant_mst

sql-statement.name: tenant.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT ADDRESS_BOOK_VALUE, AUTO_WRAPUP_INTERVAL, CAD_HIDDEN_FROM_AGENT, COMPANY_NAME, LOGIN_DOMAIN, TENANT_ID, TENANT_XML_URL, MULTI_LOGIN_PRECEDENCE FROM tenant_mst WHERE TENANT_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: virtual.team.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT VIR_TEAM_ID, VIR_TEAM_NAME, VIR_TEAM_TYPE, TENANT_ID, SERATEL_ACD FROM virtual_team_mst

sql-statement.name: site.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT SITE_ID, SITE_NAME, TENANT_ID FROM site_mst

sql-statement.name: team.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT TEAM_ID, TEAM_NAME, TENANT_ID FROM team_mst where TEAM_STATUS = 'In Service' AND TEAM_TYPE = 1

sql-statement.name: team.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT TEAM_ID, TEAM_NAME, TENANT_ID FROM team_mst where TEAM_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: agent.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT AGENT_ID, AGENT_NAME, EXTERNAL_ID, LOGIN, PASSWD, PASSWD_LAST_MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, PROFILE_ID, SITE_ID, TENANT_ID, USER_ID, IS_DEFAULT, DEFAULT_POSITION, IS_LOCKED, NICK_NAME FROM agent_mst where ACCOUNT_STATUS = 1

sql-statement.name: agent.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT AGENT_ID, AGENT_NAME, EXTERNAL_ID, LOGIN, PASSWD, PASSWD_LAST_MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, PROFILE_ID, SITE_ID, TENANT_ID, USER_ID, IS_DEFAULT, DEFAULT_POSITION, IS_LOCKED, NICK_NAME FROM agent_mst where AGENT_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: agent.profile.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT PARENT_ID, PARENT_TYPE, PROFILE_ID, PROFILE_NAME, PROFILE_TEXT, TENANT_ID FROM agent_profile_mst where STATUS_FLAG = 1

sql-statement.name: agent.profile.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT PARENT_ID, PARENT_TYPE, PROFILE_ID, PROFILE_NAME, PROFILE_TEXT, TENANT_ID FROM agent_profile_mst where PROFILE_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: all.speed.dial.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT a.LIST_ID AS LIST_ID, a.TENANT_ID AS TENANT_ID, a.LIST_NAME AS LIST_NAME, a.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID, a.PARENT_TYPE AS PARENT_TYPE, b.ENTRY_ID AS ENTRY_ID, b.ENTRY_NAME AS ENTRY_NAME, b.ENTRY_NUMBER AS ENTRY_NUMBER FROM speed_dial_list a, speed_dial_list_entry b where b.LIST_ID = a.LIST_ID

sql-statement.name: speed.dial.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT a.LIST_ID AS LIST_ID, a.TENANT_ID AS TENANT_ID, a.LIST_NAME AS LIST_NAME, a.PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID, a.PARENT_TYPE AS PARENT_TYPE, b.ENTRY_ID AS ENTRY_ID, b.ENTRY_NAME AS ENTRY_NAME, b.ENTRY_NUMBER AS ENTRY_NUMBER FROM speed_dial_list a, speed_dial_list_entry b where b.LIST_ID = a.LIST_ID AND a.LIST_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: all.password.policy.query
sql-statement.statement: select POLICY_ID, POLICY_NAME, TENANT_ID, IS_DEFAULT, MAX_INVALID_ATTEMPTS, PWD_EXPIRY_PERIOD from pwd_policy_mst

sql-statement.name: password.policy.query
sql-statement.statement: select POLICY_ID, POLICY_NAME, TENANT_ID, IS_DEFAULT, MAX_INVALID_ATTEMPTS, PWD_EXPIRY_PERIOD from pwd_policy_mst WHERE ID = ?

sql-statement.name: all.agent.to.team.mapping.query
sql-statement.statement: select ID, TENANT_ID, AGENT_ID, TEAM_ID from agent_to_team_mapping_mst

sql-statement.name: agent.to.team.mapping.query
sql-statement.statement: select ID, TENANT_ID, AGENT_ID, TEAM_ID from agent_to_team_mapping_mst where ID = ?

sql-statement.name: all.adhoc.dial.properties.query
sql-statement.statement: select ID , ENTERPRISE_ID , NAME , REG_EXP , PREFIX, STRIPPED_CHARS from adhoc_dial_properties

sql-statement.name: adhoc.dial.properties.query
sql-statement.statement: select ID , ENTERPRISE_ID , NAME , REG_EXP , PREFIX, STRIPPED_CHARS from adhoc_dial_properties WHERE ID = ?

sql-statement.name: all.aux.code.query
sql-statement.statement: select CODE_ID, OMNI_CHANNEL_AUX_ID, TENANT_ID, CODE_TYPE, CODE_NAME, IS_DEFAULT, IS_SYSTEM_AUX from aux_code_mst where AUX_CODE_STATUS = 1

sql-statement.name: aux.code.query
sql-statement.statement: select CODE_ID, TENANT_ID, CODE_TYPE, CODE_NAME, IS_DEFAULT from aux_code_mst where CODE_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: agent.media.profile.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT a.MEDIA_PROFILE_ID, a.MEDIA_PROFILE_NAME, a.NUMBER_OF_CHATS, a.NUMBER_OF_EMAILS, a.NUMBER_OF_FAXES, a.NUMBER_OF_OTHER, a.NUMBER_OF_PHONE_CALLS, a.NUMBER_OF_VIDEOS, a.TENANT_ID, a.BLENDING_MODE FROM media_profile_mst a

sql-statement.name: agent.media.profile.assignment.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT a.MEDIA_PROFILE_ID, a.ENTITY_TYPE, a.ENTITY_ID FROM media_profile_assignment a

sql-statement.name: agent.skill.profile.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT DISTINCT SKILL_PROFILE_ID, PROFILE_NAME, SKILL_ID, SKILL_NAME, SKILL_VALUE, SKILL_DESC, ENUM_SKILL_ID, ENUM_SKILL_NAME, IS_DRAFT, TENANT_ID, SKILL_TYPE, SKILL_TYPE_NAME FROM agent_skills_view

sql-statement.name: agent.team.skill.profile.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT DISTINCT AGENT_ID, TEAM_ID, SKILL_PROFILE_ID FROM agent_skills_view

sql-statement.name: skill.profile.assignment.id.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT ENTITY_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, TENANT_ID FROM skill_profile_assignment WHERE ID = ?

sql-statement.name: agent.skill.profile.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT DISTINCT PROFILE_NAME, SKILL_ID, SKILL_NAME, SKILL_VALUE, SKILL_DESC, ENUM_SKILL_ID, ENUM_SKILL_NAME, IS_DRAFT, TENANT_ID, SKILL_TYPE, SKILL_TYPE_NAME FROM agent_skills_view WHERE SKILL_PROFILE_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: third.party.vendor.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT ID, NAME, TENANT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, AGENT_URL, PROVISIONING_URL FROM third_party_vendor_mst WHERE ACTIVE = 1

sql-statement.name: third.party.profile.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT ID, NAME, TENANT_ID, MM_PROFILE_ID, CAS_ENABLED FROM third_party_profile

sql-statement.name: third.party.profile.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT ID, NAME, TENANT_ID, MM_PROFILE_ID, CAS_ENABLED FROM third_party_profile WHERE ID = ?

sql-statement.name: third.party.profile.assignment.list.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT a.THIRD_PARTY_PROFILE_ID, a.ENTITY_TYPE, a.ENTITY_ID FROM third_party_profile_assignment a

sql-statement.name: third.party.profile.assignment.query
sql-statement.statement: SELECT a.THIRD_PARTY_PROFILE_ID, a.ENTITY_TYPE, a.ENTITY_ID FROM third_party_profile_assignment a WHERE RECORD_ID = ?

sql-statement.name: third.party.profile.additional.info.list.query
sql-statement.statement: select distinct ID, NAME, TENANT_ID, CHAT_VENDOR_ID, EMAIL_VENDOR_ID from third_party_profile_view

sql-statement.name: third.party.profile.additional.info.query
sql-statement.statement: select ID, NAME, TENANT_ID, CHAT_VENDOR_ID, EMAIL_VENDOR_ID from third_party_profile_view WHERE ID = ? LIMIT 1

tenant.id: Temporary Place Holder. Configure One per tenant
